documents.title: woman robbed by 'man carrying axe '
text: a woman has suffered a head injury after a robbery by a man thought to be carrying an axe .
leicestershire police were called to grange drive , melton mowbray , just after 17:00 on wednesday afternoon after a man entered a shop and demanded money .
he fled empty-handed .
five minutes later , officers were called to a premises on craven street , also in melton mowbray , where they found the injured woman .
the suspect got away with an undisclosed amount of cash .
police have said they are not ruling out the possibility of the two incidents being linked .
author: Christian Hill

documents.title: james : i 'll do as much as i can to stay at leicester
text: on loan barnsley midfielder matty james has spoken about his ambitions to earn a place back in the leicester city side .
james , who missed the whole of last season through injury , .
joined championship side barnsley on loan in january .
`` the success that they [ leicester city ] had , and me having to just sit and watch it was difficult , '' .
the 25-year-old told bbc radio sheffield .
`` but when n'golo [ kante ] left i thought there might have been a chance for me to stamp my authority through the pre-season but i ended up getting a kidney stone .
`` it just seemed to knock me back in the pecking order .
`` i 'll do as much as i can to stay at that [ leicester city ] football club . ''
author: BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: your questions : where does the leicester city football badge come from ?
text: james michael robinson got in touch using your questions to ask : where does the leicester city football badge come from ?
leicester city 's club historian , john hutchinson , has told me that the fox part of the badge represents the county and the white flower , a cinquefoil , is for the city .
the cinquefoil can also be seen on the logos for organisations including leicester city council and the university of leicester .
the fox was chosen in the 1940s when many of the club 's directors came from the county , a popular fox hunting area .
the club has had a number of different badges , but this current one came into existence in 1992 .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: alan birchenall : 'every day unreal ' since cardiac arrest
text: leicester city club ambassador alan birchenall has made his first public appearance seven weeks after he suffered a cardiac arrest at an awards ceremony .

`` for me every day is unreal because the birch was gone , '' he said .
`` it knocks your confidence .
i owe my life to a defibrillator and some lovely people . ''

documents.title: university of leicester researchers reveal how big ben 'bongs '
text: scientists from the university of leicester have used lasers to analyse how the sound of big ben 's `` bongs '' is created .
big ben - officially known as the great bell - is the largest of five bells that hang in the belfry of elizabeth tower at the palace of westminster .
the team was granted exclusive access .
for the first-ever attempt to assemble a vibration map of big ben and reveal how it produces its harmonious tone .
two lasers were used to scan big ben as it chimed at 9 , 10 , 11 and 12 o'clock .

`` aside from the technical aspects , one of the most challenging parts of the job was carrying all of our equipment up the 334 steps of the spiral staircase to the belfry , '' said martin cockrill , who led the team from the university .
author: David Briggs
Director, Sound Waves: The Symphony of Physics

documents.title: wenger : ranieri sacking 'surprising and disappointing '
text: arsenal boss arsene wenger has been using his weekly press conference to comment on the sacking of claudio ranieri by leicester last week .
`` i was surprised and disappointed .
i take this opportunity to wish him well and congratulations to him for what he achieved at leicester , '' wenger told reporters .
`` what will happen in the future for leicester , i do n't know , but the players responded well against liverpool .
they are in a fight to stay in the league but they have enough quality . ''
wenger 's arsenal finished second to ranieri 's leicester last season as the foxes won the premier league title .
not that you needed reminding .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicestershire police respond to critical hmic report
text: leicestershire police deputy chief constable roger bannister has said some of the concerns in a hmic report that rates his force as `` requiring improvement '' can be put down to staffing .
he told bbc radio leicester : `` in 2009 , compared to where we are currently , it is a fact that there are 547 fewer officers .
`` i do n't want to bamboozle you with figures , but that is a 23 % reduction on where we have been compared with where we are today .
inevitably , that does bring some pressure on the force . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicestershire police criticised in hmic report
text: leicestershire police has been told it needs to improve the way it investigates crime , according to a report by her majesty 's inspectorate of constabulary ( hmic ) .
hmic also said the force needed to improve the way it protects vulnerable people from harm and to support victims better .
however , the inspectorate said leicestershire police is good at tackling anti-social behaviour and tackling serious , organised crime .
you can read hmic 's report in full here .

documents.title: foxes to fight financial fair play breach charge
text: leicester city have confirmed they are legally challenging a football league charge of breaching financial fair play ( ffp ) rules in 2014 .
it came as the premier league champions released their financial results for 2015-16 on thursday and declared a pre-tax profit of £ 16.4m .
